GeneDef.label: low fertility
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a lower chance of becoming pregnant or impregnating others.

GeneDef.label: lustful
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are more likely to engage in lovin' with their partner, regardless of their genders.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Highly increase the chance of lovin'.

GeneDef.label: composed mind
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are strong-willed and calm. They will never start social fights against their peers, they are less inclined to start negative interactions with them, and their mental breakdowns are also always non-violent.

customEffectDescriptions.li: less chance to trigger a negative interaction with someone

GeneDef.label: emotionally brittle
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are much more susceptible to breaking under pressure, and they will spend much more time in mental breakdowns than the average person.

GeneDef.label: reserved
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene keep their problems to themselves rather than discussing their issues with someone else.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Negative memories are more impactful and last much longer

GeneDef.label: loyal
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene exhibit more loyalty to their belief than the average person.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This pawn is much more persuasive when converting others and is harder to convert
Gain mood bonus or malus depending on the certainty level

GeneDef.label: natural psy-sensitivity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are more attuned to nature than other psychically sensitive persons.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Pawn will receive a -25% penalty to their psyfocus recovery when meditating near a non-natural spot

GeneDef.label: psychic manipulation
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can influence other persons with their psychic sensitivity. The higher their sensitivity is, the higher their influence becomes

customEffectDescriptions.li: Each 25% psychic sensitivity beyond 100% will add a bonus point to this person's social aptitude

GeneDef.label: animal connection
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have an easier time communicating with wild and tamed animals.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Reduce the chance for an animal to enter a manhunter state after a failed taming attempt if the carrier has more than 150% psychic sensitivity

GeneDef.label: psychic channeling
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can channel their psychic sensitivity into their melee weapon or fists to gain the upper hand against their enemies in melee combat. The higher the psychic sensitivity of the carrier is, the stronger they are.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Grants a permanent effect that scales with the carrier's psychic sensitivity

GeneDef.label: psychic protection
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can channel their psychic sensitivity as armor or use it to predict multiple possibilities for a few seconds, allowing them to anticipate and dodge melee hits or even bullets. The higher the psychic sensitivity of the carrier is, the stronger or more accurate this effect is.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Grants an ability to switch between two modes. This gene grants a permanent effect that scales with the carrier's psychic sensitivity

(Default mode) Tank mode:
Maximum Armor Blunt Protection +20%
Maximum Armor Sharp Protection +20%
Maximum Stagger Time Multiplier -50%
Maximum Move Speed Malus -0.20
Maximum Pain Shock Threshold x150%
Maximum Incoming Damage Multiplier x75%

(Alternative mode) Dodge mode:
Maximum Ranged Dodge Chance +20%
Maximum Melee Dodge Chance +15.0
Maximum Injury Healing Factor +20%
Maximum Stagger Time Multiplier -25%
Maximum Move Speed Bonus 0.20
Maximum Pain Shock Threshold x120%
Maximum Incoming Damage Multiplier x90%

GeneDef.label: last stand
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are able to gather and condense all of their psychic energy in an attempt to perform a last stand. They will become much harder to kill and will have a bonus in melee damage for 2 hours. Once this effect expires, the carrier will fall into a 2-day coma. If the carrier dies during the effect, he will create a small psychic explosion around him. Additionally, if the carrier has a psyfocus need, activating this ability will drain all of it.

customEffectDescriptions.li:
Last stand (2 hours):
Psychic sensitivity x0.10
Incoming Damage Multiplier x50%
Melee Damage Factor x150
Pain Shock Threshold x150%
Note: when this effect is active, all genes related to psychic sensitivity scaling will be disabled.

GeneDef.label: slow aging
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene age more slowly after reaching 18 years old.

GeneDef.label: toxic vulnerability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are vulnerable to toxic buildup and environmental toxins. Such as pollution, toxic fallout, tox gas, and direct attacks with venom or injected poison

GeneDef.label: genetic purity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene will birth a foxian if they are a foxian themselves. Otherwise, they are very likely to give birth to a female offspring with all endogenes or xenogenes inherited.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This gene will follow one of the two behaviors if the mother is a Foxian or is considered foxian enough

Behaviour 1: The mother is foxian. She will either birth a female child with the foxian xenotype, or in some rare cases, she will birth a special child with the greater foxian xenotype. That special child can either be a male or a female (it is more likely to be a male). Only the cosmetic genes, such as hair color or skin color, will be transmitted to the child

Behaviour 2: The mother is not a foxian. She will birth a normal child and transmit all of her endogenes to the offspring if this gene was active as an endogene. Otherwise, she will transmit all of her xenogenes.

GeneDef.label: immaculate
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene produce less filth than the average person.

GeneDef.label: female only
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are always biologically female.
